Sentencas: This paper reports the results of combined experimental and modeling studies of reversible solid-oxide cells.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: The tubular cells are fabricated using a Ni-YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) fuel-electrode support, a dense YSZ electrolyte membrane, and a strontium-doped lanthanum manganate-YSZ composite air electrode.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: Experiments are designed to systematically vary gas-phase species partial pressures and operating temperatures.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: The fuels are mixtures of H-2, CO, H2O, CO2, and Ar.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: Performance is measured under anodic (fuel cell) and cathodic (electrolysis) polarization.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: The models consider reactive porous-media transport within the composite electrodes, thermal chemistry on Ni and YSZ surfaces, and charge-transfer chemistry.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: All chemistry is modeled with elementary reversible reactions.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: Close coupling between experimental measurements and model-based interpretation provides a basis for establishing reaction pathways and rates.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2

Sentencas: In addition to advancing fundamental understanding, the resulting detailed reaction mechanisms are valuable for incorporation into predictive models that can be used for design and optimization of fuel-cell and electrolysis systems.
Titulo: Polarization Characteristics and Chemistry in Reversible Tubular Solid-Oxide Cells Operating on Mixtures of H2, CO, H2O, and CO2
